name: Jelly Jelly
description:
Enjoy this wonderful underwater adventure! You've never had so much fun with jellyfish!


Game features

- Variety of challenging stages
- Easy and simple user interface
- You can choose button mode or tilt mode
- Cute and wonderful sea create design
- Controlling jelly jelly is fun itself :)
- Supports Retina graphics
- Buy cool power-ups and fun characters!

How to play

- For clear stage, arrive the right side on the screen with some buttons
- Move both sides with left and right button
- Jump with jump button
